amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the mixed oxide fuel program at the Department of Energy by $17,319,000 and redirects the funds to the National Nuclear Security Administration's Global Threat Reduction Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect funds within the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 328 - 89 (Roll no. 325).
